tng.quote: The line must be drawn here!
Things are only impossible until they're not.
It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose.
I am not programmed to be fun.
I have no use for telepaths.
Today is a good day to die.
Perhaps today is a good day to die! Prepare for ramming speed!
Death is an experience best shared.
You may test that assumption at your convenience.
There is no greater challenge than the study of philosophy.

voyager.quote: Do it.
There's coffee in that nebula!
We're Starfleet officers. Weird is part of the job.
I'm a doctor, not a decorator!
Please state the nature of the medical emergency.
We are Borg. Lower your shields and surrender your ships.
Survival is insufficient.
Irrelevant.
You are Borg.
Resistance is futile.
Live long and prosper.
I am not programmed to feel anxiety.
Time travel. Since my first day I swore I'd never let myself get caught in one.
Set a course... for home.
One impossible thing at a time.
I don't need anyone's permission to die.
Hope is the first step on the road to disappointment.
Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.
I'm just a hologram. I can't die.
There's a crack in the space-time continuum.
This ship is the collective home of many cultures.
Fear exists for one purpose: to be conquered.
Without freedom of choice there is no creativity.
I won't sacrifice the crew's safety for a principle.
We are not going to win this war with technology alone.
Abandon ship? The answer's no. I'm not breaking up the family.
We'll just have to find a way to live with it.
Fortune favors the bold.
A captain's first duty is to the ship.
Every moment counts.

ds9.quote: It's easy to be a saint in paradise.
I can live with it.
But at this moment, the wrong feels so right.
The truth is just an excuse for lack of imagination.
I believe in coincidences. I just don't trust them.
Never tell the same lie twice.
The truth is usually just an excuse for a lack of imagination.
Paranoia is just another word for longevity.
I'm a very good tailor.
Lying is a skill like any other.
Never begin a negotiation on an empty stomach.
The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife.
Good, bad... I'm the one with the phaser.
Sometimes the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer.
I'm not a diplomat. I'm an engineer.
You're not just the hero. You're the villain too.
Justice, like beauty, is in the eye of the beholder.
Victors write history.
If you have to ask, you'll never know.
On Earth, there is no poverty, no crime, no war.
You can't make an omelette without breaking a few eggs.
In war, truth is the first casualty.
The price of freedom is eternal vigilance.
A man either lives life as it happens to him, meets it head-on and licks it.
Hate is a luxury we can't afford.
It's not what you believe, it's what you do.
Never turn your back on a Breen.
Every storm runs out of rain.
The end justifies the means.
Hope is a dangerous thing.
What you leave behind is not as important as how you lived.
Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
Even in the darkest moments, there can be light.
Trust is earned, not given.
May your path be filled with light.
Fear is the true enemy, the only enemy.
Innocence is a luxury we can no longer afford.
You can't go back, only forward.
Some people should never be allowed near a holosuite.
Death is not the end.
We all have our roles to play.
Sacrifice is the price of peace.
Never underestimate the power of a good story.
The past is written, the future is unwritten.
War is negotiation by other means.
Sometimes to save the many, you must risk the few.
Loyalty is its own reward.
The road to hell is paved with good intentions.
Never give up, never surrender.
We are the dreamers of dreams.
A closed mind is the most dangerous weapon.
Only the dead have seen the end of war.
Life is a journey, not a destination.
Rules are made to be broken.
